description: Customer Search Web Frontend - Next.js interface for searching and viewing customers via Customer API with Docker Compose orchestration

userStories.title: Initialize Next.js Frontend Project
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a Next.js project structure so I can build the customer search interface.
acceptanceCriteria: Create Next.js project in `src/frontend` directory
Configure TypeScript
Install and configure shadcn/ui component library
Set up project structure (components, lib, app directories)
Configure environment variables for API URL
Add .gitignore for frontend
Project builds successfully with `npm run build`
Development server runs with `npm run dev`
Code builds successfully
All Tests pass with code coverage greater than 80%
userStories.notes: Project structure created manually. Build verification will occur via Docker in US-002 and US-004 since Node.js is not installed on host.

userStories.title: Create Dockerfile for Frontend
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a Dockerfile for the frontend to enable containerized development.

Use Node.js 20+ Alpine base image
Configure build stages for development with hot reload support
Install dependencies and expose port 3000
Dockerfile builds successfully
Code builds successfully
All Tests pass with code coverage greater than 80%
userStories.notes: Created multi-stage Dockerfile with development (hot reload), build, and production stages. Added .dockerignore to optimize build context.

userStories.title: Configure Docker Compose for All Services
